trans-unit.source: Use Bearer Authentication (recommended): Use a Token for Bearer Authentication (RFC 6750) and API key instead of the standard e-mail address and API key.
Email: The e-mail address associated with the API key.
API Key: This is the API key made available on your account page (https://dash.cloudflare.com/profile)
Domains: Please tick the domains whose cache should be flushed on Cloudflare upon clearing all caches in TYPO3.
Enable Analytics Backend module: Tick this checkbox if you need the Analytics module in Backend (this requires proper Token permissions if using Bearer Authentication).
Originating IPs: Tick this checkbox in case you cannot restore the originating IPs at the webserver level.
Purge individual files by URL: Granularly remove individual files from Cloudflare's cache by specifying the URL.
Purge cache by Cache-Tag: Granularly remove individual files from Cloudflare's cache by specifying the associated Cache-Tag. BEWARE: This option requires an Enterprise account.
Empty list fetched from Cloudflare, please check your credentials.
